name: Oatville Community Church
tagline: Small church with a big heart
mission: reach the lost and show and grow in Christ's love
description: A non-denominational community church with a mission to "reach the lost and show and grow in Christ's love."
welcomeMessage: Small church with a big heart and love for the community - come as you are and experience God's love in a place that feels like home.

christianEducation.name: Christian Education
christianEducation.description: Sunday school and Christian education for all ages

sundayWorship.name: Sunday Worship
sundayWorship.description: Traditional hymns, contemporary music, and organ-led worship

wednesdayPrayer.name: Wednesday Prayer
wednesdayPrayer.description: Community prayer gathering for fellowship and spiritual support

bibleStudy.name: YaWeh Bible Study
bibleStudy.description: Deep dive into scripture with fellowship and discussion

childrensMinistry.name: Children's Ministry
childrensMinistry.description: Children's church and nursery services available

specialEvents.name: Special Events
specialEvents.description: Vacation Bible School, Good Friday, Resurrection Sunday

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To reach the lost and show and grow in Christ's love - creating a welcoming community where people can experience authentic faith and fellowship.

worship.title: Our Worship
worship.description: Blending traditional hymns, contemporary music, and organ-led worship to create a meaningful worship experience for all generations.

community.title: Our Community
community.description: A small church with a big heart - non-denominational and focused on authentic connection, accessibility, and spiritual growth through inclusive programming.

seo.title: Oatville Community Church | Wichita, KS | Non-Denominational Church
seo.description: Oatville Community Church - A non-denominational community church in Wichita, KS. Small church with a big heart. Sunday worship at 11 AM & 5 PM, Christian education at 10 AM.
